overview: Still Life Moving, shot in April 2020, shows the artist and her housemate marvelling at the beautiful colours that sunlight casts through various coloured drinking glasses on their kitchen counter. This work - like Geraldine Snell's moving image work Dancing, exhibited at S1 Artspace - is from the series Light & Love. These works were originally shared on social media to provide a soft, haptic counterpoint to the quick, slick imagery we are subjected to in digital space, in unconditional eternal testimony to the sublimely mundane.
title: Still Life Moving
